bool RobotAgent::resetScenario ( hrc_ros::ResetRobotROSRequest &  req,
hrc_ros::ResetRobotROSResponse &  res 
)
private

Control service to reset robot actions/position (task manager calls during the operation).

Parameters
reqResetRobotROS Request object
resResetRobotROS Response object
Returns
True if initialization was successful

Definition at line 41 of file RobotAgent.cpp.

void RobotAgent::update ( )
private

Opens up the websocket server (despotMDPHuman connects to it and provides human action decision and the current state) The socket information is defined under the variables below. Port = 9090
